channel.title: Loveandpower - Nominations
channel.description:
[quote="Loveandpower"]Tutorials:
-personally...he has so many recently even if they are mostly snippets I feel Strucker should have some sort of recognition as he has been learning all at the same time and that's more than deserving in my eyes.
Developments:
-davidi2's/sinisouls mopar server -arios -world 901 -rsc server mitb style yo
interviews: -Interview with Flame_ + Ambokile ?:D( I mean interview your own selves ) -I'd also like to suggest perhaps Tabbykiller or Connhunter. I know Coon he is a great guy! :) I can't say what he does but some questions may not be able to be answered due to what he does. (which makes him very mysterious for the moparians who don't actually know him )[/quote] I'll agree on having Strucker as a mentioned tutorial author. Perhaps this month, tutorial nominees can have their name mentioned along with their notable contributions. I'll agree on the above mentioned developments, except for Arios. They've been mentioned in previous editions and can probably be put on the side for the mention of a more recent development. As for an interview among myself and Ambokile, I'll leave that up to the community for future editions. TabbyKiller and CoonHunter can be considered in the future as well. This month's interviewed member is going to be Newty, though.
Thoughts?

item.title: Loveandpower - Nominations
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

[quote=“Ambokile, post:4, topic:534256”][quote author=Flame_ link=topic=653054.msg4376312#msg4376312 date=1382143002]

I’m not sure how you or I would be interviewed.

Have the community propose questions and we’d answer them and place them in a future edition.
[/quote]
Sounds interesting, but no one would propose anything.[/quote]
Well, propose questions for Newty as I’m interviewing him Sunday afternoon.

Read full topic

[quote=“Loveandpower”]Tutorials:

-personally…he has so many recently even if they are mostly snippets I feel Strucker should have some sort of recognition as he has been learning all at the same time and that’s more than deserving in my eyes.

I’ll agree on having Strucker as a mentioned tutorial author. Perhaps this month, tutorial nominees can have their name mentioned along with their notable contributions.
I’ll agree on the above mentioned developments, except for Arios. They’ve been mentioned in previous editions and can probably be put on the side for the mention of a more recent development.
As for an interview among myself and Ambokile, I’ll leave that up to the community for future editions. TabbyKiller and CoonHunter can be considered in the future as well.
This month’s interviewed member is going to be Newty, though.
